get.summary: Check if the server is running and returns the server name and version.

200.description: OK

get.description: This endpoint returns all clientes. If parameters are provided, it returns the clientes that match the parameters.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to paginate clientes.

parameters.name: nombre_cliente
parameters.description: The name to filter clientes.

parameters.name: numero_documento
parameters.description: The numero_documento to filter clientes.

parameters.name: estado_comercial
parameters.description: The estado_comercial to filter clientes.

parameters.name: identificador_Unico
parameters.description: The identificador_Unico to filter clientes.

200.description: The operation was successful and the clientes are returned.

total.description: The total number of clientes returned.

post.description: This endpoint creates a new cliente.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The cliente object to be created.

201.description: The operation was successful and the clientes are returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id to filter clientes by id.

200.description: The operation was successful and the cliente are returned.

post.summary: Get a all fics by fideicomiso and user.
post.description: This endpoint returns a all fics.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The body of the request.

200.description: The operation was successful and the fic are returned.

post.summary: Obtains the fideicomisos with the sum of their balances

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The body of the request.

movimientos.description: If true, the endpoint will return the last date of the movements.

200.description: The operation was successful and the fideicomisos are returned.

post.description: This endpoint returns a Estados Financiero.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The body of the request.

200.description: The operation was successful and the EEFF file is returned.

parameters.name: numero
parameters.description: The number to filter fics.

200.description: The operation was successful and the fic are returned.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The code to filter fideicomisos by code.

200.description: The operation was successful and the fideicomiso are returned.

get.description: This endpoint returns all fideicomisos. If parameters are provided, it returns the fideicomisos that match the parameters.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to paginate fidecomisos by page.

parameters.name: nombre
parameters.description: The name to filter fideicomisos by nombre.

parameters.name: tipo
parameters.description: The document type to filter fideicomisos by tipo.

parameters.name: estado
parameters.description: The document type to filter fideicomisos by estado.

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: The creation date to filter fideicomisos by date created.

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: The update date to filter fideicomisos by date updated.

200.description: The operation was successful and the fideicomisos are returned.

total.description: The total number of fideicomisos returned.

post.description: This endpoint creates a new fideicomiso.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The fideicomiso object to be created.

201.description: The operation was successful and the fideicomiso are created.

204.description: The request was successful but there is no content to send back.

get.summary: Get all fideicomisos by user no relations
get.description: This endpoint returns all fideicomisos. If parameters are provided, it returns the fideicomisos that match the parameters.

parameters.name: id_usuario
parameters.description: The user id.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to paginate fidecomisos by page.

parameters.name: nombre
parameters.description: The name to filter fideicomisos by nombre.

parameters.name: tipo
parameters.description: The document type to filter fideicomisos by tipo.

parameters.name: estado
parameters.description: The document type to filter fideicomisos by estado.

200.description: The operation was successful and the fideicomisos are returned.

total.description: The total number of fideicomisos returned.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The fideicomiso object to be update.

200.description: The operation was successful and the fideicomiso are updated.

204.description: The request was successful but there is no content to send back or fideicomiso not found.

200.description: The operation was successful and the detail are return.

cantidad.description: The total number of fideicomisos created.
The total number of fideicomisos fail.

post.description: This endpoint returns all fideicomisos list with name, code and fics by user.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The body of the request.

200.description: The operation was successful and the fideicomisos are returned.

204.description: The request was successful but there is no content to send back.

get.description: This endpoint returns all movimientos. If parameters are provided, it returns the movimientos that match the parameters.

parameters.name: nombre

parameters.description: The date to filter movimientos.

parameters.description: The id to filter movimientos.

fullData.description: If true, returns all movimientos data.

take.description: The number of movimientos to take.

200.description: The operation was successful and the movimientos are returned.
